This script is used to take the corrected read tables and the taxonomic assigments to determine proportion of individual prey items based on reads in 18S and MiFish

```{r}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(vegan)
```

Bring in the cleaned tables at the taxon level not ASV
```{r}
# note: these are not the cleaned table, but this is just a place holder to develop script and check that the final_taxonomy script works as expected
table_18s <- read.csv(here("18S-test", "Test_18S_taxon_decontam_table.csv"), header = T) 
table_fish <- read.csv(here("MarkerTest","Test_MiFish_taxon_decontam_table.csv"), header = T)

```
